channel.title: A quick reminder for all users of the SSP + MC SSP
channel.description:
The multiple account rule may be more relaxed than what it was previously but this doesn't give anyone permission to register 10 accounts and spam the server status page with their server, or try to trick users/staff into thinking they're another server so they get more clicks on top of that. One advertisement per runescape server.
I've gone through the status page and removed every single server that did this, and handed out an IP ban as a warning to the most offending servers. Now that the page isn't clogged up with pages of the same server I'd like to encourage any member who suspects rule breaking on the page to forward their report to a moderator so we can maintain the page effectively.
Now that's cleared up I'd like to announce the addition of the MoparCraft status page, it has been on the todo list for quite a while but it is finally here for members to post their own minecraft servers on. You can access it at: http://www.moparcraft.net if there are any problems please forward them in a PM to me.
Thanks :)

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The multiple account rule may be more relaxed than what it was previously but this doesn’t give anyone permission to register 10 accounts and spam the server status page with their server, or try to trick users/staff into thinking they’re another server so they get more clicks on top of that. One advertisement per runescape server.

Thanks
